Package org.rapla.facade

This package contains the facade, that encapsulate the storage and the entitie package and provides a simple interface for accessing the rapla-system; Study this package to get a good summary of the functionality of Rapla.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AllocationChangeListener After a store all registered ChangeListeners get notified by calling the trigger method.
CalendarModel  
CalendarOptions This class contains the configuration options for the calendar views like Worktimes and dates configuration is done in the calendar option menu.
CalendarSelectionModel  
ClassifiableFilter  
ClientFacade A collection of all module-interfaces
Conflict A conflict is the allocation of the same resource at the same time by different reservations.
ModificationEvent Encapsulate the changes that are made in the backend-store.
ModificationListener Classes implementing this interface will be notified when changes to reservations or resources occurred.
ModificationModule All methods that allow modifing the entity-objects.
PeriodModel ListModel that contains all periods.
QueryModule Methods for quering the various entities of the backend
UpdateErrorListener Classes implementing this interface will be notified when an update error occurred.
UpdateModule  
UserModule Encapsulates the methods responsible for authentification.
 

Class Summary
AllocationChangeEvent  
AllocationChangeEvent.Type  
Conflict.Util  
RaplaComponent Base class for most components.
 

Exception Summary
CalendarNotFoundExeption  
 

Package org.rapla.facade Description

This package contains the facade, that encapsulate the storage and the entitie package and provides a simple interface for accessing the rapla-system; Study this package to get a good summary of the functionality of Rapla.
